about_the_game:
Overview

Welcome to Obama's collection of horror mazes! You (The Obama Hunter) Must navigate through the former president's mazes in order to collect all of his "Obama Prisms." These mystical rocks go by many names, "Obamiums", "Obama Prisms", and or "Obama Pyramids". However, the name of them doesn't matter when you are being chased in hot pursuit by the former president.

This game is a joke horror-comedy game please don't get too upset by it...

The 3 maps

  • Normal Maze. Welcome to Obama Maze. This will most likely be your first real course in the game. You will start in a randomly generated brick maze. You must navigate the never seen before generated maze and collect all 7 Obamiums but watch out! You will be chased by none other than former United States President Barack Obama. This maze will not only generate Obamiums but you also will find traps! Traps can be used to slow down Obama so he cannot catch you. Once you collect all of the Obamiums you will hear the maze door opening and it is your job to locate the door and escape the maze.

  • Endless Maze. This maze is similar to the first Normal Maze level however instead of collecting 7 Obamiums there isn't a score limit. 6 Obamiums will be spawned at once so if you cannot find one you surely will find another one.

  • Forest Maze. This maze is unique like the last. Instead of a standard brick maze, you will be navigating a forest. This forest is wide open and dark, you'll easily lose your sense of direction here. Be sure once you collect all 7 Obamiums you head back to the truck which you spawned at.

Once you complete all 3 Mazes you're awarded with self esteem of beating a video game... for now.

Additionally I'd like to warn despite it being a free to play game, that does not mean the system requirements match most other free to play game. You will need a decent computer for this game and if you do not meet or exceed the system requirements you may have a rough time playing the game.
detailed_description:
Overview

Welcome to Obama's collection of horror mazes! You (The Obama Hunter) Must navigate through the former president's mazes in order to collect all of his "Obama Prisms." These mystical rocks go by many names, "Obamiums", "Obama Prisms", and or "Obama Pyramids". However, the name of them doesn't matter when you are being chased in hot pursuit by the former president.

This game is a joke horror-comedy game please don't get too upset by it...

The 3 maps

  • Normal Maze. Welcome to Obama Maze. This will most likely be your first real course in the game. You will start in a randomly generated brick maze. You must navigate the never seen before generated maze and collect all 7 Obamiums but watch out! You will be chased by none other than former United States President Barack Obama. This maze will not only generate Obamiums but you also will find traps! Traps can be used to slow down Obama so he cannot catch you. Once you collect all of the Obamiums you will hear the maze door opening and it is your job to locate the door and escape the maze.

  • Endless Maze. This maze is similar to the first Normal Maze level however instead of collecting 7 Obamiums there isn't a score limit. 6 Obamiums will be spawned at once so if you cannot find one you surely will find another one.

  • Forest Maze. This maze is unique like the last. Instead of a standard brick maze, you will be navigating a forest. This forest is wide open and dark, you'll easily lose your sense of direction here. Be sure once you collect all 7 Obamiums you head back to the truck which you spawned at.

Once you complete all 3 Mazes you're awarded with self esteem of beating a video game... for now.

Additionally I'd like to warn despite it being a free to play game, that does not mean the system requirements match most other free to play game. You will need a decent computer for this game and if you do not meet or exceed the system requirements you may have a rough time playing the game.
legal_notice:
This game is not an opinion or meant to defame the former United States President. This is a merely a comedy-horror game.
Legal email address: anthonystainton+legal@gmail.com
name: Obama Maze

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Ryzen 3 1200, Intel i5-4570, or similar.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX 570, GTX 1060, or similar.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Some older GPUs may work perfectly fine or not at all.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 1600, Intel i5-7400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1660 Ti, RX 5600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommended 16:9 Display. Recommended for 4k 60fps OR 1080p 140 fps.

reviews:
“What is this shit ass tutorial? I've never seen a tutorial worse than this... In my entire life.”
10/10 – forsen

“nuh uh”
idk/10 – CallMeCarson
short_description: Obama Maze is a 3D horror experience with the former United States president, Barack Obama. You must navigate through his courses collecting all 7 of his "Obamiums." Collect all 7 in order to leave his maze.
